name: HEART OF THE MACHINE
description:
This game was made during the sixth 48 h  Mini Beans Jam 2020 (Theme: "You Move the Earth").

It is strongly recommended that you use a controller.

Features 
  • Resource management
  • Steam punk setting
  • And a lot of pressure (pun intended)
Controls

WASD to move | Controller Thumb Stick to move

R to interact | A to interact

Credits

Tanja Wiemer | Level design, 3D Art, Game Design, Story

Yasmin Burkhardtsmaier | Coding, Sound Design, Game Design

Special thanks to Antonia Schmidt ( Voice Actress)
